question: Data hiding in Python is a technique used to prevent direct access to class ________ from outside the class.
To achieve data hiding in Python, you prefix the attribute name with a double ________.
Data hiding helps protect sensitive data by preventing ________ modification or access.
In Python, private variables are not directly accessible outside the class but can be accessed using ________ mangling.
Data hiding is important because it ________ security and prevents unauthorized access to data.
To safely access or modify private data, you use ________ methods like getters and setters.
Data hiding helps maintain data ________ by controlling how data is accessed and modified.
In Python, private methods can also be hidden using the same double underscore prefix as for ________.
Data hiding is beneficial for debugging because it helps track errors more ________.
A real-life example of data hiding is an ATM system where PIN and balance are kept ________.
